item.title: ConfigurationService
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Core Namespace Catel.Configuration Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Portable Class Libraries, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public class ConfigurationService : IConfigurationService Implements interfaces IConfigurationService Configuration service implementation that allows customization how configuration values are being used inside an application.
